#### hacer un gif
#probar esto  
m<-leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles()%>% 
  addMarkers(lng=city$Longitude,lat=city$Latitude, data=city,popup=~City) %>% 
    setView(m,lng=city$Longitude[5],lat=city$Latitude[5],zoom=4.5)%>% 
      addPolylines(lng = city$Longitude, lat =city$Latitude, layerId = NULL, group = NULL,
      stroke = TRUE, color = "#03F", weight = 2.5, opacity = 0.5,
      fill = FALSE, fillColor = "blue", fillOpacity = 0.2, dashArray = NULL,
      smoothFactor = 1, noClip = FALSE, popup = NULL, popupOptions = NULL,
      label = NULL, labelOptions = NULL, options = pathOptions(),
      highlightOptions = NULL, data = getMapData(m))
m
